products.title: Embellished Strapless Crop Top in Gold
products.body_html:
Create an unforgettable two-piece look with the glittering Odetta crop top. Fully embellished with sparkling hotfix embellishment, Odetta is cut from our stretch jersey fabric with woven metallic yarn throughout. An understated silhouette with detachable shoulder straps and a bodycon fit, this sleek design will catch the light beyond party season.

Straight bandeau neckline
Grip tape along neckline for a secure fit
Adjustable and detachable cami straps
Bodycon design
Discrete side zipper for easy closure
Fully lined in stretch mesh
Cropped length, approx. 23 cms based on a UK size 8
Product code: 8385

We do our best to ensure that our photos are as true to colour as possible. However, due to inconsistencies in monitors, digital photography, and production variations, we cannot guarantee that the colour you see on your screen accurately portrays the true colour of the product.

products.title: Embellished A-Line Mini Dress in Gold
products.body_html:
Sparkle season has arrived at Oh Polly and the Arabella mini dress is a premium design created to capture the light. Created in our stretch jersey fabric with woven metallic yarn throughout, Arabella features all over hotfix embellishment to enhance its sparkle. This stunning A-line silhouette is cut to a mini length with a high neckline and open back.

High scoop neckline
Racer back design
Sultry cut-out back
A-line mini skirt
Thigh-high split
Pull-on design
Fully lined in stretch mesh
Mini length. Side Neck Point to Hem 77cms based on a UK size 8
Product code: 8388

products.title: Embellished Cold Shoulder Mini Dress in Grape
products.body_html:
Romantic moments. Cut from our premium stretch mesh fabric, the elegant Beaufort mini dress offers a curve-enhancing and supportive fit. Its delicate draped neckline, sultry low back, and a ruffled handkerchief hem are sure to set hearts aflutter, while the all-over bead and crystal hand embellishment add an extra special touch. Beaufort is made for enchanting evenings.

Adjustable shoulder straps and back strap
Off-the-shoulder ruffle sleeves
Hidden side zipper
Asymmetric hem
Slightly sheer
Fitted design
Delicate hand embellishment throughout
Mini length, side seam approx. 61 cms based on a UK size 8
Product code: 8093

We do our best to ensure that our photos are as true to colour as possible. However, due to inconsistencies in monitors, digital photography, and production variations, we cannot guarantee that the colour you see on your screen accurately portrays the true colour of the product.

products.title: Embellished Maxi Dress in Blue Ombré
products.body_html:
Ombré evenings. Designed by our team of in-house ateliers for an unforgettable look, Monte Carlo is a maxi dress design with all-over delicate hand embellishment, placed to create a scene-stealing ombré effect. Complete with a bust-flattering cowl neckline, narrow split on reverse, and adjustable multi-strap detailing.

Cowl neckline
Adjustable shoulder straps
Self-tie halter neck fastening
Hook and eye and hidden zipper fastening at reverse of bralet
Hidden zipper on reverse of skirt
Bodycon silhouette
Narrow split on reverse for ease of movement
Fully embellished with seeded beading
Maxi length, approx. 147 cms based on a UK size 8
Product code: 7962

products.title: Cut Out Maxi Dress in Emerald Green
products.body_html:
Designed for a dramatic evening look, the Audra maxi dress features a wide, V-neckline which displays the décolletage and ends in long, split flare sleeves. This slinky cut-out maxi dress was made in our ultra-soft jersey fabric, which clings to the body with a comfortable yet supportive fit.

Split flare sleeves
Ruched bust
Pull on design
Thigh split
Ruched side seam of skirt
Maxi length, approx. 156 cms based on a UK size 8
Product code: 7866

products.title: Embellished Cowl Neck Maxi Dress in Blush
products.body_html:
Make an entrance in the Champel maxi dress. Designed in our premium, hand embellished fabric with a soft jersey underlay that sits gently against the skin, Champel is a fully embellished design with a bust flattering cowl neckline. Multi strap detailing supports the semi sheer, split flare long sleeves whilst the semi-sheer extra long maxi skirt is complete with a leg exposing high split. Made for premium events, Champel is the must have style you need for party season and beyond.

Cowl neckline
Adjustable shoulder straps
Self tie halter neck strap
Hook and eye and zipper fastening at reverse of bralet
Hidden zipper to the side of skirt
Built in bodysuit with clasp fastening 
Thigh high split
Maxi length, approx. 141cms based on a UK size 8

Product code: 6139

products.title: Long Sleeve Godet Mini Dress in Cherry Red
products.body_html:
Designed in two statement shades, the Leotine mini dress is perfect for creating a memorable date night look. It’s crafted from our premium georgette fabric with satin underwired cups that provide elevated support. Capturing the allure of the season, it’s complete with an A-line skirt enhanced with playful godet pleats.

Underwired bust (available in 2 sizes)
Long fitted sleeves with flare cuff
Self-tie back fastening
Concealed side zip fastening 
Cut-outs at side and back
A-line skirt with godet pleats
Mini length, approx. 53cm based on a UK size 8
Product code: 8078

products.title: Plissé Ruffle-Trim Maxi Dress in Powder Blue
products.body_html:
Ethereal silhouettes. Designed to elevate your occasionwear rotation, the Kazumi maxi dress is crafted from lightweight georgette and adorned with intricate plissé ruffle trims and cups that create a stunning three-dimensional effect. It’s cut to a classic column silhouette, punctuated with a side split, and framed with a whimsical sweetheart neckline. 


Sweetheart neck


Adjustable camisole shoulder straps 


Underwired fitted cups for enhanced bust support


Plissé ruffle trims at cups and front 


Thigh-high side split


Concealed rear zip fastening


Column silhouette


Maxi length, approx. 126.7cm based on a UK size 8


Product code: 9070

products.title: Give Me Fever Ruched Twist Bikini Top in Berry
products.body_html:
Is it hot in here? Give Me Fever’s about to become your new favourite, made in double-layered swim fabric with ruched, underwired cups, clasp back fastening and twist detail halter straps. Best paired with the Give Me Fever bikini bottoms and a cool cover up.
Fuller bust? Our size XS and S are available in + sizes for girls who need fuller cups. - Ruched, twist front- Top is approx 13cm- Double layered, stretch swim fabric- Style code: NS0042

products.title: Lace Up Corset Bandeau Micro Mini Dress in Mauve
products.body_html:
Inspired by romantic boudoir styling, the Emira mini dress is a stand out style in our latest collection. Cut from our premium satin fabric in two amorous colourways, Emira is a bandeau mini dress with exposed balcony cups overlaid with a deconstructed, lace up corset. Lace up ribbon detailing accentuates the front and sides of this glamorous evening dress with satin ribbon ties fastening at the hem of the dress.

Strapless neckline
Hidden zipper on reverse
Lace up detailing at front and sides
Tight cut for a bodycon fit
Mini length
Please note: colouring may appear different online due to lighting
Product code: 6377

products.title: Tulle Skirt Corset Mini Dress in Dusty Pink
products.body_html:
A beautiful mini dress design with a waist cinching satin corset and voluminous tulle skirt, the Floriane mini dress is flattering and feminine. Designed in our lustrous satin fabric, the Floriane corset features underwired cups and built in boning that cinches the wearer's silhouette with boudoir inspired delicate hook and eye fastenings down the front. A statement tulle skirt with discrete built in knickers completes this graceful mini dress style and creates a flattering and flirty look. 

Underwired cups
Adjustable shoulder straps
Built in corsetry (boning, hook and eye)
Hidden zipper on reverse
Full tulle skirt
Built in Brazilian cut knickers
Mini length, approx. 77 cms based on a UK size 8
Product code: 6754

products.title: Embellished Cowl Neck Crop Top in Lime
products.body_html:
Designed to make an impact, La Desirade is super cropped and super embellished. Fully beaded with extra long mesh sleeves that flare at the wrist, the La Desirade crop top features an underwired bust with a pearl embellished, cowl neck overlay. It’s time to feel adorned in our embellished mesh crop top.

Discrete zipper on reverse and self tie neck strap
Underwired cups
Embellished raglan sleeves
Cropped length, approx. 25cms based on a UK size 8
Product code: 4558

products.title: Asymmetric Draped Mini Dress in White
products.body_html:
A dreamy silhouette designed in two fresh summer shades, the Josiane mini dress is a flattering and floaty style created to ensure a sculpted and romantic silhouette. All about intricate detailing, this delicate and pretty mini dress features supportive underwired cups adorned with a gentle frill with one flowy cap sleeve and a single shoulder strap. Cut to a mini length in our lightweight georgette fabric, the Josiane mini dress is complete with a body skimming asymmetric skirt accentuated with waterfall ruffle detailing at the side. Romantic, flattering and undeniably pretty, Josiane is a style you’ll love for all premium events this season.

Adjustable shoulder strap
Single flowy cap sleeve and off the shoulder sleeve
Underwired cups
Hidden zipper to the side
Asymmetric a-line mini skirt with waterfall ruffle detailing
Mini length
Product code: 6909

products.title: Side-Tie Cheeky Bikini Bottoms in Fiery Red
products.body_html:
Dive into nostalgia with the Cove bikini bottoms. Modelled on classic, universally flattering styles, they’re crafted from lightweight stretch-jersey swim fabric to a high-cut silhouette. They feature slender tie straps at each side for a custom fit and turn to reveal cheeky coverage, ideal for minimal tan lines on endless sun-drenched beach days. 


Cheeky back coverage


Adjustable side-tie straps 


High-cut leg


Pull-on design


Standard bikini bottom length, approx. 18.2cm based on size S


Product code: NS0830

products.title: Embellished Cowl Neck Crop Top in Sand
products.body_html:
With long flared sleeves and a bust-flattering draped cowl neckline, this ultra-cropped top is the elevated staple you need for upcoming events this season. Designed in super soft mesh fabric with delicate pearl adornment, La Désirade is the perfect combination of high fashion styling and signature Oh Polly glamour. Compliment this cropped top by styling with our embellished thigh split maxi skirt or mesh mini skirt for a high impact, high fashion event look.
- Underwired bust
- Exposed zipper on reverse
- Super cropped length, approx 16cm
- Embellished mesh fabric
- Style code: 4558

products.title: Cutwork Backless Cotton-Poplin Camisole Top in White
products.body_html:
Taking inspiration from intricate Mediterranean artwork, the Vasilia camisole top is elevated with laser-cut detailing and scalloped edges. It’s crafted from lightweight cotton poplin, ideal for warm-weather styling, and features a statement open back with adjustable ties.


Plunge V-neck


Slender cross-back shoulder straps 


Scalloped trim


Cutwork embroidery


Open back with adjustable ties


Relaxed fit


Slightly cropped length, SNP to hem approx. 32.5cm based on a UK size 8 


Product code: 14392

products.title: Cutwork Cotton-Poplin A-Line Mini Dress in White
products.body_html:
Inspired by Mediterranean artwork, the Calina mini dress is uplifted with intricate cutwork detailing at the hem. Ideal for warm-weather dressing, it’s crafted from lightweight cotton poplin to a figure-skimming A-line silhouette and framed with a scalloped neckline. The shirred back panel and adjustable shoulder straps mean enhanced comfort and support, always. 


Plunging V-neckline


Adjustable tapered shoulder straps


Scalloped trim


Cutwork embroidery 


Contouring seams


Elasticated shirred back panel


Concealed side zip fastening


A-line silhouette


Mini length, SNP to hem approx. 82cm based on a UK size 8

products.body_html:
For the romantics. A dress you’ll reach for on warm-weather days, the Aeris maxi is crafted from lightweight cotton poplin with a touch of stretch. The plunge-neck silhouette is elevated with a front cut-out and slender ties. The adjustable halterneck means your perfect level of support every time.


Plunge V-neck

Column silhouette
